title: 01/01/21 - HOUR 2 - Joel Klatt, Blazing 5, Eric Mangini
itunes:title: 01/01/21 - HOUR 2 - Joel Klatt, Blazing 5, Eric Mangini
description:
In Hour 2 of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, FOX Sports college football analyst Joel Klatt weighs in with predictions for the College Football Playoff semifinal games. Also, Colin unveils his "Blazing 5" for the weekend. Plus, FS1 NFL analyst Eric Mangini offers his perspectives on NFL news like red-hot Baltimore charging into the postseason, Kansas City resting quarterback Patrick Mahomes and what a Dak contract means for Dallas long term.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
